show.title: Love, Lies Aur Dhokha
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/4WxFvN
show.description: Naina Malhotra, trapped in a loveless marriage with Shreyash, battles betrayal, abuse, and the poisonous schemes of Misty. Just when she stands on the edge of breaking, her childhood protector Dhruv returns bringing hope, strength, and a chance to reclaim her dignity. “Only You” is a tale of love, betrayal, and the courage to rise against cruelty.
show.description_secondary: Naina Malhotra, trapped in a loveless marriage with Shreyash, battles betrayal, abuse, and the poisonous schemes of Misty. Just when she stands on the edge of breaking, her childhood protector Dhruv returns bringing hope, strength, and a chance to reclaim her dignity. “Only You” is a tale of love, betrayal, and the courage to rise against cruelty.
